response.job_title: Medical Director. Chairman, Surgical Oncology en MD Anderson Cancer Center
response.skills: Surgical Oncology, General Surgery, Peritoneal Carcinomatosis, Scientific Societies Leadership, Gastrointestinal Surgery, Gastrointestinal Cancer, Intraperitoneal Chemotherapy, Scientific Writing, Oncology Clinical Research, Asistencia sanitaria, Cirugía, Cirugía general, Cáncer, Ensayos clínicos, Gestión sanitaria, Hospitales, Investigación clínica, Medicina, Oncología

profile_positions.title: Medical Director. Chairman, Surgical Oncology. Co-director, Peritoneal Surface Oncology Program

profile_positions.description:
Responsable del funcionamiento y organización de la actividad del  Área Quirúrgica: coordinación del uso de la misma por los distintos servicios quirúrgicos, previsiones de necesidades de programación quirúrgica y ocupación, evaluación y aprobación de nuevos materiales y equipamientos, seguimiento de actividad,  elaboración del plan de inversiones anual. 

Valoración de pacientes con carcinomatosis peritoneal para su discusión multidisciplinar para decisión de la estrategia terapéutica más adecuada para cada caso.
Desarrollo de la cirugía radical de la carcinomatosis peritoneal (citorreducción combinada con quimioterapia intraperitoneal intraoperatoria hipertérmica-HIPEC)
Desarrollo de proyectos de investigación clínica y traslacional en Oncología Peritoneal
profile_positions.title: Surgical Oncology  Coordinator / Attending Surgical Oncologist / Peritoneal Surface Oncology Program

profile_positions.description: Academic appointment with full clinical privileges in Gastrointestinal Surgical Oncology

Profesor Colaborador Doctor (Oncología). Facultad de Medicina.

company.name: MD Anderson Cancer Center
company.description:
The University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center is one of the world's most respected centers devoted exclusively to cancer patient care, research, education and prevention. MD Anderson provides cancer care at several convenient locations throughout the Greater Houston Area and collaborates with community hospitals and health systems nationwide through MD Anderson Cancer Network®.

U.S. News & World Report's "Best Hospitals"​ survey has ranked MD Anderson the nation's top hospital for cancer care. Every year since the survey began in 1990, MD Anderson has been named one of the top two cancer hospitals. The recognition reflects the passion of our 21,000 extraordinary employees and 1,000 volunteers for providing exceptional care to our patients and their families, and for realizing our mission to #EndCancer. 

You can view all of our career opportunities at careers.mdanderson.org.
